Content.Text:
<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Yo! I heard you're buildin' a Flying Ship, so I
came by to lend a hand.
<PAGE>
So what's a "flying ship?" You're tellin' me you
can make a boat that sails through the air? This
must be one'a them foreign blueprints.
<PAGE>
Well, it's an odd-lookin' thing, but I think I
understand the principle behind it.

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Okay, let's get to work! I'll give you some
pointers as we go, so do like I tell you, 'kay?

<FACE_KAISER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
There, looks like it's all done. So, how do you
actually operate this thing?
<PAGE>
Anyway, I'll be headin' on home, then.

The Flying Ship is complete! I should put it
somewhere.
